text.section: The portion of the proceeds of bonds issued to pay costs of a project may be invested in investments or other obligations that mature no later than the times when the proceeds will be needed.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the Corporation shall determine the investment of bond proceeds.
If the Corporation loans the proceeds of the bonds to a person as provided in § 10-519 of this subtitle, the loan recipient shall determine the investment of bond proceeds.

text.section:
The Corporation or the loan recipient may apply earnings and profits on investments or other obligations:
to the payment of any cost; or
in any other lawful manner.
